concept.title: Identifying Ignition Problems
concept.shortdesc: Irregular engine exhaust sounds, particularly uneven sputtering and banging, indicate potential ignition problems that require immediate attention to prevent engine damage.

section.title: Warning Signs
section.p: Key indicators of ignition problems include:

ul.li: Deterioration of the entire mechanical system

section.title: Best Practices
section.p: For proper engine maintenance and operation:

ul.li: Listen for a soft, steady purr from the exhaust - this indicates proper operation
Stop and repair issues when possible rather than continuing to drive
